display_name: Smith Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire (SMEQ): During the first half hour after having awakened in the morning, how tired do you feel?
description:
Item from the Smith Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire. [Smith CS et al., 1989 (PubMed ID: 2793773)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/2793773/)

[Search for all Smith Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/sandd/variables?search=smeq)
